Name: Chris Jordan
Teams: England, Surrey, Sussex, Sylhet Super Stars, Peshawar Zalmi, Royal Challengers Bangalore, Adelaide Strikers, Sunrisers Hyderabad, City Kaitak, Bloem City Blazers, Chittagong Vikings, Northern Knights, England Lions, Paktia Panthers, Punjabi Legends, Sydney Thunder, Trinbago Knight Riders, Qalandars, Perth Scorchers, Punjab Kings, Karachi Kings, Team Buttler, Islamabad United, Southern Brave
Bio: a fast bowler with a level-headed calmness  a fearsome yorker,found his niche as a death specialist in T20 cricket for Engl after initially breaking through as a bowling allrounder in Tests  ODIs,Jordan's career looked to be going nowhere at the end of 2012 when he was released by Surrey,but he made his international debut less than a year later,He enjoyed a run in Engl's white-ball sides in the games following the 2013-14 Ashes tour,was given a Test debut the following summer
